user_question: How can I predict the stock price of a company using machine learning, and generate a plot of the predicted vs actual prices?
final_answer: To predict the stock price, you can use a machine learning model like LSTM. A plot of predicted vs actual prices has been generated. LSTM is suitable for this task because it can capture temporal dependencies and patterns over time.
